frameDefinitions: This frame is concerned with words that describe a person based on a salient part of their body.
An Entity is judged to be sensually pleasing or intellectually interesting to a (generally implicit) Judge.
This frame covers descriptions of an entire human body, viewed as a gestalt (as opposed to descriptions based on salient body parts).
A particular Binding_principle is (or is not) operative, that is, any obligations, restrictions, and any other aspects of the Binding_principle are (or are not) in effect.
Temporary or permanent Styles and Configurations of Hair, as well as its inherent Nature.
A Color serves as a landmark in color-space, either a point-like landmark (e.g. burnt sienna) or a broader region (e.g. blue).
frameExamples: We saw this <t>beautiful</t> boat with the red sails several times
This law will only become in <t>effect</t> during the last three weeks of the year.
On either side her head gleamed coiled <t>braids</t> of dark-gold hair , almost pale copper in the subdued light of the room .
I really like that shade of <t>blue</t>.
listRoleDefinitions: This role identifies the <fen>Individual</fen> (or individuals) being described.
This role identifies the <fen>Figure</fen> or form being described by the target.
The <fen>Entity</fen> for which a particular gradable <fen>Attribute</fen> is appropriate and under consideration.
The feature of an <fen>Entity</fen> which is under discussion.
A modifier expressing    the deviation of the implicit value either from the norm or from the value for another <fen>Entity</fen>.
The <fen>Time</fen> during which the <fen>Entity</fen> is in the state of having a particular implicit value for the <fen>Attribute</fen>.
The location where the <fen>Entity</fen> is in the state of having a particular implicit value for the <fen>Attribute</fen>.
This role identifies the individual (or individuals) being described.
This role identifies the <fen>Figure</fen> or form being described by the target.
The <fen>Binding_principle</fen> is the law, contract, principle, or other (set of) obligations that is (or is not) operational.
The <fen>Time</fen> at which the <fen>Binding_principle</fen> is in effect.
The <fen>Place</fen> at which the <fen>Binding_principle</fen> is or is not operational.
This role is the hair itself
This role is the Possessor of the body part.
Temporary Configurations of hair (eg braid, bun, ponytail).   Something done to the hair merely by movement.
A property of the hair (eg curly, fine, brown).  This acts much like 'Descriptor' in the Observable_bodyparts Frame.  Colors, styles, natural properties are described by this frame element.
This role identifies the <fen>Entity</fen> described by the <fen>Color</fen>.
A position in color-space, generally used to describe the quality of some <fen>Entity</fen>.
listRoleExamples: The red-haired <fex>figure</fex> stood in the doorway.
Once <fex>the treaty</fex> is in effect, US port authorities and the Coast Guard will monitor compliance by checking any yacht 79 feet or longer.
All patent applicants and owners should be aware of the current uncertainty as to what patent fees will be in effect <fex>on October 1, 1998</fex>
This promotion is void <fex>in the state of Florida</fex>.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: The Shell Guide To The River Shannon
